Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 16/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
